Name: Flipkart Customer
Comment: Using it since last week.The display, photo and performance are best. Touch sensitivity is best. Photos are so natural, night time photos are too good. Photo quality after zooming is also good. Videos are also good. Better to buy Pro Max for longer battery backup. After heavy use, watching movies, battery consumption is 70% per day in average (no idea about backup for game users). Regarding weight, I am used to it. Dint find much difference from Samsung M31S and Flagship models. You can hold ...

Name: Abinash Mohanty
Comment: The product is just Awesome  love it 6gbRAM 256gb its enough worth of money.Love the product,good build in camera.Magnificient phn,no other phones can replace it.

Name: Flipkart Customer
Comment: The best ever camera from apple, it gives you 2x more realistic and crystel clear photo than iphone11Its new colour feature(pacific blue) gives you a standard royal vibes as never before, its A14 bionic chip is as faster as wind which is great for gaming

Name: Susruta Samanta
Comment: Excellent product. Smooth operation, Very fast flipkart delivery. I received on 15/11.  Even Flipkart customer care called many times to know the  phone use experience and reminded me 7 days return policy in case any problem.  This is a new experience from Flipkart.

Name: Flipkart Customer
Comment: Great phone fantastic display butter smooth switching between apps and overall thanks to flipkart for keeping up the delivery as per promise highly recommended!!

Name: Dr Chanmiki  Laloo
Comment: This is another big leap for iphone. The iphone 12 pro max the largest ever iphone.Camera is always superior to all, even though it does not have a 120 Hz, ite as smooth as ever.Display is awesome, sound is wow! Indeed with the a14 bionic , it is indeed the best iphone ever made.

Name: Arvind Gopal
Comment: I contemplated on getting this from before it was launched and then finally took the plunge. Excellent phone and features to say the least. My next four years will be serene.
